p: The anti-inflammatory role of OHC has been studied in mice models having acute inflammation. The underlying mechanism was that OHC downregulated the NF-kB pathway and inhibited TAK1 phosphorylation and its interaction with TAB1. Inhibitory action of OHC against COX-2 was more pronounced than curcumin [ 86]. Further, LPS-induced overproduction of NO, inducible NO synthase, COX-2 expression in RAW 264.7 macrophage cells were inhibited by OHC. Degradation of IkB-Î± was attenuated by OHC that averted the NF-kB translocation to the nucleus [ 87].
